full_summary:
**National Portfolio Management Tender**

**Reference Information**

* **Reference Number**: WS4296532264
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4296532264
* **Publication Date**: 2023-11-15
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-01-09T14:00:00
* **Amendment Number**: 5
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-01-05

**Procurement Details**

* **Procurement Category**: Service (SRV)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: The combined highest rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Trade Agreements**: This procurement aligns with the following trade agreements:
    * Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
    * Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    * Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    * Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    * Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    * Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    * Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    * Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    * World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    * Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    * Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Contract Details**

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-04-02
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None
* ** Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Division of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Notification**: To all eligible suppliers, please note that this amendment supersedes all previous amendments. The closing time for submissions has been modified to 14:00 EST on 2024-01-09.
 
This Request for Proposal (RFP) is open to Supply Arrangement Holders (SAH) who have been qualified under Tier 2 for the Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS) SA. This procurement aims to satisfy the requirement of Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) for the provision of Task and Solutions Professional Services. The Service Provider will be required to provide services on an as-and-when-requested basis for
